h2_title: Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong
content: If you have collected all the Buddha's Eyeballs, you won't have to travel far to use them. On your left, from the Rockrest Flat Shrine, you can find the Rock Clash Platform arena. This arena will initially spawn the Stone Vanguard boss, but if you use the Buddha's Eyeballs on the rock in the arena, you will also spawn the Shigandang boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
If you have collected all the Buddha's Eyeballs, you won't have to travel far to use them. On your left, from the Rockrest Flat Shrine, you can find the Rock Clash Platform arena. This arena will initially spawn the Stone Vanguard boss, but if you use the Buddha's Eyeballs on the rock in the arena, you will also spawn the Shigandang boss.
